isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - REMOVE - SHIFTING CONTROLS

step1.para: Disconnect the two 1/8 inch air lines at the "S" or Supply Port and "P" or End Port of the slave valve on the transmission case ( Figure 19).

figure.caption: Figure 19. Disconnect Air Lines at Supply Port and End Port of Slave Valve

note.para: For models equipped with the A-3546 or Roadranger Valve A-5010, the gear shift lever housing assembly can now be removed from shifter housing.

step1.para: For models equipped with the Roadranger Valve A-5015 or A-4900, also disconnect the 1/8 inch O.D. air hose line at the L" or Low Range Port of slave valve ( left, Figure 20); and the 1/8 inch O.D. air line at the Center Port or reduction cylinder/splitter cylinder cover ( right, Figure 20).

figure.caption: Figure 20. Disconnect Air Line at Low Range Port and Center Port

note.para: If desired, the gear shift lever housing assembly can now be removed from the shifter housing.

step1.para: Disconnect the two 1/8 inch O.D. air lines at the Range Valve of models so equipped ( left, Figure 21). Remove the ball grip, loosen the valve mounting clamp and remove the valve, mounting clamp, air lines, sheathing and O-rings from the gear shift lever ( right, Figure 21).

figure.caption: Figure 21. Disconnect Air Lines at Range Valve and Remove Valve

step1.para: For models so equipped, remove the two mounting screws in the valve cover ( Figure 22).

figure.caption: Figure 22. Remove Mounting Screws in Valve Cover

step1.para: Slide the cover down the shift lever expose the valve ports and disconnect the 1/8 inch O.D. air lines ( Figure 23).

figure.caption: Figure 23. Slide Cover Down to Expose Valve Ports and Disconnect Air Lines

step1.para: Loosen the jam nut and turn the valve and nut from the gear shift lever ( Figure 24). Remove the valve cover, air lines, sheathing and O-rings from the lever.

figure.caption: Figure 24. Turn Valve and Nut From Gear Shift Lever

step1.para: Disconnect and remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and air filter/regulator assembly ( Figure 25).

figure.caption: Figure 25. Disconnect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and Air Filter/Regulator Assembly

step1.para: For 8-speed "LL" or 13-speed models, also disconnect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the air filter/regulator assembly and reduction/splitter cylinder ( Figure 26).

figure.caption: Figure 26. Disconnect Air Hose Between Air Filter/Regulator and Reduction/Splitter Cylinder

step1.para: Remove the two bolts and the air filter/regulator assembly ( Figure 27).
Disconnect and remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and the Low Range Port in the housing of the range cylinder ( Figure 28).

figure.caption: Figure 28. Remove Air Hose Between Slave Valve and Low Range Port

step1.para: Disconnect and remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and the High Range Port in the cover of the range cylinder ( Figure 29).

figure.caption: Figure 29. Remove Air Hose Between Slave Valve and High Range Port

step1.para: Remove the four retaining bolts and the slave valve from the transmission case ( Figure 30).
Remove the hat-type alignment sleeve from the bore in slave valve ( Figure 31).
Remove the spring and plunger pin from the bore in the transmission case ( Figure 32). Remove slave valve gasket.

figure.caption: Figure 32. Remove Spring and Plunger Pin

step1.para: If necessary, remove the air hose fittings from the slave valve ( Figure 33).

figure.caption: Figure 33. Remove Air Hose Fittings From Slave Valve

note.para: For disassembly and reassembly of piston-type Slave Valve Assembly ONLY, refer to SLAVE VALVES.
